instant_payments_worldwide: Receive instant payments anywhere in the world.
flexible_pos_desc: No need to wait any longer to accept online payments. Start e-commerce with a single integration on your website.
flexible_wallet_desc: Earn, convert, and spend with your digital wallet! Manage all financial transactions easily, from money transfers to payments.
flexible_invoice_desc: All payment transactions in one place! Provide services from bill payments to transfers, subscriptions, and even insurance.
